[code] Function FindColor(ByVal Color As Long, ByVal X1 As Long, ByVal Y1 As Long, ByVal X2 As Long, ByVal Y2 As Long, _ ByVal Window As Long) As POINT
TestDC = GetDC(Window) For yy = Y1 To Y2 For xx = X1 To X2 If GetPixel(TestDC, xx, yy) = Color Then temp.x = xx temp.y = yy FindColor = temp
Exit Function End If
Next xx Next yy FindColor.x = -1 FindColor.y = -1 [/code]

item.title: [REQ] VB.NET FindColor Help?
item.dc:creator: @Danny Danny
item.description:
@Danny wrote:

Function FindColor(ByVal Color As Long, ByVal X1 As Long, ByVal Y1 As Long, ByVal X2 As Long, ByVal Y2 As Long, _
      ByVal Window As Long) As POINT

        TestDC = GetDC(Window)
        For yy = Y1 To Y2
            For xx = X1 To X2
                If GetPixel(TestDC, xx, yy) = Color Then
                    temp.x = xx
                    temp.y = yy
                    FindColor = temp

                    Exit Function
                End If

            Next xx
        Next yy
        FindColor.x = -1
        FindColor.y = -1
